title: Duck and watermelon salad
ingredients: ['2 duck breasts', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon black pepper', '30g chopped coriander leaves', '15g chopped fresh mint leaves', '250g watermelon cut in chunks', '100g cashew nuts', '1 tablespoon oil', '2 tablespoons pomegranate or cranberry juice', '1 teaspoon soy sauce', '1 1/2 tablespoons brown sugar']
